sub_title: Cyber Security | Sustainability | Cyber Strategy & Organisation Lead for Netherlands, France, Belgium & Luxembourg | Women in Tech®
summary:
I am a senior executive in Accenture Netherlands’ Security Practice. Within the Security Practice, I lead Cyber Strategy & Organisation across Gallia region since Sep 2022. Prior to that I led the Southeast Asia Cyber Security Strategy & Human Potential practice which focused on ensuring strategic business alignment and adoption for security transformations globally.

With a passion for organizational enablement, transformation and sustainability, and my expertise in Cyber Security Strategy, I partner with senior client leaders to collaboratively design and implement security strategy, keeping a value-add mindset to align business and security outcomes, and to build cyber resilient strategy and culture.

Global Industries: Oils & Gas, Telco, Insurance & Financial Services, Software & Platforms
